titles.title: Supporting the goals and ideals of "Chiari Malformation Awareness Month" and "Chiari Malformation Awareness Day" in the United States.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform.

bill.summary: Expresses support for the goals and ideals of Chiari Malformation Awareness Month and Chiari Malformation Awareness Day.
